title: Scholarship
content: Guys, what is the scholarship amount given  for CNR  and MRD scholarship per sem??

comments.body:
CNR - 40% of your sem fee, and the sem fee is half of the yearly fee (or simply 20% of your yearly fee)

MRD - 50% of your sem fee, and the sem fee is half of the yearly fee (or simply 25% of your yearly fee)

CNR Rs 25600 per sem
MRD Rs 32000 per sem
DAC RS 2000 per sem
So total fee is considered, not tuition fee right?

the percentages are up on their website.

this question has been asked and answered 5 billion times right here. 

why do you ask?
For our batch yes 1.28L per year for kcet batch 27
for us its 1.2l + 10k (to be eligible for scholarships)... so MRD will be 50% of 1.3l or 1.2l ?
